entry.title: A new beginning
entry.content: Over the years I’ve attempted to document my thoughts, successes and failures in many locations throughout the internet, but never had a good output for my technical works. I first started building this blog roughly 2 years ago, but only recently started lining up things to publish. Over the next few weeks, months, and hopefully years, I’ll start sharing tips and tricks I’ve discoveredâ€”sometimes as I discover them. Stay tuned.
